anger.quote: Courage is knowing what not to fear

anger.quote: Decide that you want it more than you are afraid of it

anger.quote: A cat bitten once by a snake dreads even rope

anger.quote: Fear makes the wolf bigger than he is

anger.quote: Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our light, not our darkness that most frightens us. We ask ourselves, Who am I to be brilliant, gorgeous, talented, and fabulous? Actually, who are you not to be? You are a child of God. Your playing small does not serve the world. There is nothing enlightened about shrinking so that other people will not feel insecure around you. We are all meant to shine, as children do. We were born to make manifest the glory of God that is within us. It is not just in some of us; it is in everyone and as we let our own light shine, we unconsciously give others permission to do the same. As we are liberated from our own fear, our presence automatically liberates others

anger.quote: I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little-death that brings total obliteration. I will face my fear. I will permit it to pass over me and through me. And when it has gone past, I will turn the inner eye to see its path. Where the fear has gone there will be nothing. Only I will remain
anger.author: Bene Gesserit

anger.quote: Try again. Fail again. Fail better

anger.quote: Success isn’t permanent and failure isn’t fatal

anger.quote: All my successes have been built on my failures

anger.quote: Those who dare to fail miserably can achieve greatly. John F

anger.quote: Anyone who attempts is not a failure

anger.quote: No man is defeated without until he has first been defeated within

anger.quote: If we will be quiet and ready enough, we shall find compensation in every disappointment

anger.quote: I don’t believe in failure. It is not failure if you enjoyed the process

anger.quote: A minute’s success pays the failure of years

anger.quote: Make new mistakes. Make glorious, amazing mistakes. Make mistakes nobody’s ever made before

anger.quote: Mistakes are the portals of discovery

anger.quote: Failure is an attitude, not an outcome

anger.quote: Failure is simply an opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently

anger.quote: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly. Robert F

anger.quote: There’s meaning in every failure. Find it

anger.quote: Failure is success in progress

anger.quote: Losers quit when they fail. Winners fail until they succeed. Robert T

anger.quote: There is no failure. Only feedback

anger.quote: It is hard to fail, but it is worse never to have tried to succeed
anger.author: Theodore Roosevelt

anger.quote: We are all full of weakness and errors; let us mutually pardon each other our follies

anger.quote: Don’t worry about failures, worry about the chances you miss when you don’t even try

anger.quote: First principle: never to let one’s self be beaten down by persons or by events

anger.quote: In any case, you must not confuse a single failure with a final defeat. F

anger.quote: Rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I built my life. J.K
anger.author: Rowling

anger.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough
anger.author: Og Mandino

anger.quote: You can’t let your failures define you. You have to let your failures teach you

anger.quote: The only failures are those who fail to try. Lester B

anger.quote: Success depends upon previous preparation, and without such preparation there is sure to be failure

anger.quote: I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can’t accept not trying

anger.quote: Life is to be lived, not controlled; and humanity is won by continuing to play in face of certain defeat

anger.quote: There is no such thing as failure, only results

anger.quote: Don’t think of it as failure. Think of it as time-released success

anger.quote: Sport and life is about losing. It’s about understanding how to lose

anger.quote: Failure is unimportant. It takes courage to make a fool of yourself

anger.quote: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work. Thomas A

anger.quote: Many of life’s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up. Thomas A
anger.author: Edison

anger.quote: Success is usually the culmination of controlling failure
anger.author: Sylvester Stallone

anger.quote: Sometimes life’s going to hit you in the head with a brick. Don’t lose faith
anger.author: Steve Jobs

anger.quote: When it’s tough, will you give up or will you be relentless?
anger.author: Jeff Bezos (Amazon)

anger.quote: It’s fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure
anger.author: Bill Gates

anger.quote: Failure is an important part of your growth. Don’t be afraid to fail
anger.author: Michelle Obama

anger.quote: I’ve missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I’ve lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I’ve been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed
anger.author: Michael Jordan

anger.quote: You have to be able to accept failure to get better
anger.author: LeBron James

anger.quote: Making your mark on the world is hard. If it were easy, everybody would do it. But it’s not. It takes patience, it takes commitment, and it comes with plenty of failure along the way
anger.author: Barack Obama

anger.quote: In a world that’s changing really quickly, the only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is to not taking risks
anger.author: Mark Zuckerberg (Facebook)

anger.quote: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it’s a failure, you will fail above everyone else’s success
anger.author: James Cameron (Terminator, Avatar, Titanic)

anger.quote: If at first you don’t succeed, destroy all evidence that you tried
anger.author: Steven Wright

anger.quote: I didn’t fail the test, I just found 100 ways to do it wrong
anger.author: Benjamin Franklin

anger.quote: Please know that I am aware of the hazards. I want to do it because I want to do it. Women must try to do things as men have tried. When they fail, their failure must be a challenge to others
anger.author: Amelia Earhart (First female aviator to fly solo across the Atlantic Ocean)

anger.quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm
anger.author: Winston Churchill

anger.quote: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows
anger.author: Buddha

anger.quote: My great concern is not whether you have failed, but whether you are content with your failure
anger.author: Abraham Lincoln

anger.quote: Victory has a hundred fathers, but failure is an orphan. John F
anger.author: Kennedy

anger.quote: When you fail to prepare, you’re preparing to fail
anger.author: John Wooden (More on that quote here)

anger.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall
anger.author: Oliver Goldsmith

anger.quote: Failure is success if we learn from it
anger.author: Malcolm Forbes

anger.quote: The best way out is always through
anger.author: Robert Frost

anger.quote: Without failure there is no achievement. John C
anger.author: Maxwell

anger.quote: The cost of failure is…learning
anger.author: Neil Strauss

anger.quote: You always pass failure on the way to success
anger.author: Mickey Rooney

anger.quote: To err is human, to forgive, divine
anger.author: Alexander Pope

anger.quote: Apprentice yourself in failure
anger.author: Robert Greene

anger.quote: It’s not failure, it’s unfinished success
anger.author: Unknown

anger.quote: Attitude is the essence of failure or success
anger.author: Unknown

anger.quote: Key to failure: Trying to please everyone
anger.author: Unknown

anger.quote: Failure open doors to new opportunities
anger.author: Unknown

anger.quote: The bigger the failure, the greater the lesson
anger.author: Unknown

anger.quote: Tough situations build strong people
anger.author: Unknown

anger.quote: No man is a failure who is enjoying life
anger.author: William Feather

anger.quote: My reputation grows with every failure
anger.author: George Bernard Shaw

anger.quote: The phoenix must burn to emerge
anger.author: Janet Finch

anger.quote: No garden is without its weeds
anger.author: Thomas Fuller

anger.quote: Failure is a detour, not a dead-end street
anger.author: Zig Ziglar

anger.quote: If you aren’t making mistakes, you aren’t taking enough risks
anger.author: Debbie Millman

anger.quote: Failure either ruins you or turns you into the man you can become
anger.author: Tucker Max

anger.quote: It doesn’t matter how many times you have failed, you only have to be right once
anger.author: Mark Cuban

anger.quote: Do the one thing you think you cannot do. Fail at it. Try again. Do better the second time. The only people who never tumble are those who never mount the high wire
anger.author: Oprah Winfrey

anger.quote: It’s only when you risk failure that you discover things. When you play it safe, you’re not expressing the utmost of your human experience
anger.author: Lupita Nyong’o

anger.quote: Everything negative – pressure, challenges – is all an opportunity for me to rise
anger.author: Kobe Bryant

anger.quote: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today. H. G
anger.author: Wells

anger.quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time. Thomas A
anger.author: Edison

anger.quote: You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated. In fact, it may be necessary to encounter the defeats, so you can know who you are, what you can rise from, how you can still come out of it
anger.author: Maya Angelou

anger.quote: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don’t try
anger.author: Beverly Sills

anger.quote: Love the moment. Flowers grow out of dark moments. Therefore, each moment is vital. It affects the whole. Life is a succession of such moments and to live each, is to succeed
anger.author: Corita Kent

anger.quote: Not failure, but low aim, is a crime
anger.author: James Russell Lowell

anger.quote: A hundred failures would not matter, when one single success could change the destiny of the world. Arthur C
anger.author: Clarke

anger.quote: Failure doesn’t kill you… it increases your desire to make something happen
anger.author: Kevin Costner

anger.quote: There is no failure unless one stops. Not to work is to cease, tighten up, become nervous and therefore destructive of the creative process
anger.author: Ray Bradbury

anger.quote: Every adversity, every failure, every heartache carries with it the seed on an equal or greater benefit
anger.author: Napoleon Hill

anger.quote: The real test is not whether you avoid this failure, because you won’t. It’s whether you let it harden or shame you into inaction, or whether you learn from it; whether you choose to persevere
anger.author: Barack Obama

anger.quote: No matter what one does, regardless of failure or success, the experience is a form of success in itself. Jack Ma (alibaba
anger.author: com)

anger.quote: Embrace failure. Never never quit. Get very comfortable with that uneasy feeling of going against the grain and trying something new
anger.author: Terry Crews

anger.quote: I think you have to try and fail, because failure gets you closer to what you’re good at.
anger.author: Louis C.K

anger.quote: Your dream doesn’t have an expiration date. Take a deep breath and try again
anger.author: Unknown

anger.quote: Success is often achieved by those who don’t know that failure is inevitable
anger.author: Coco Chanel

anger.quote: It is very important to embrace failure and to do a lot of stuff — as much stuff as possible — with as little fear as possible
anger.author: Stefan Sagmeister

anger.quote: It’s much, much better to wind up with a lot of crap having tried it than to overthink in the beginning and not do it
anger.author: Stefan Sagmeister

anger.quote: Failure changes for the better, success for the worse
anger.author: Seneca

anger.quote: Failure is not fatal, but failure to change might be
anger.author: John Wooden

anger.quote: We are all failures – at least the best of us are. J.M
anger.author: Barrie

anger.quote: Excuses are the nails used to build a house of failure
anger.author: Jim Rohn

anger.quote: What we fear doing most is usually what we most need to do
anger.author: Tim Ferriss

anger.quote: I think perfection is ugly. Somewhere in the things humans make, I want to see scars, failure, disorder, distortion
anger.author: Yohji Yamamoto

anger.quote: Life is a Tetris. Do something good, it disappears immediately. But mistakes, they accumulate themselves. In the end everyone loses
anger.author: Alexandra Melo (More on that quote here)

anger.quote: Keep on beginning and failing. Each time you fail, start all over again, and you will grow stronger until you have accomplished a purpose – not the one you began with perhaps, but one you’ll be glad to remember
anger.author: Anne Sullivan

anger.quote: Success or failure is caused more by mental attitude than by mental capacity
anger.author: Walter Scott

anger.quote: Your failure does not define you, your determination does
anger.author: Unknown

anger.quote: Those who truly fail in my eyes are the ones who never try at all. The ones who sit on the couch and whine and moan and wait for the world to change for them
anger.author: Sarah Dessen

anger.quote: There are two kinds of failures: those who thought and never did, and those who did and never thought. Laurence J
anger.author: Peter

anger.quote: When you take risks you learn that there will be times when you succeed and there will be times when you fail, and both are equally important
anger.author: Ellen DeGeneres

anger.quote: Such a simple concept, yet so true: that which we manifest is before us; we are the creators of our own destiny. Be it through intention or ignorance, our successes and our failures have been brought on by none other than ourselves
anger.author: Garth Stein

anger.quote: Mishaps are like knives, that either serve us or cut us, as we grasp them by the blade or the handle
anger.author: James Russell Lowell

anger.quote: A person who doubts himself is like a man who would enlist in the ranks of his enemies and bear arms against himself. He makes his failure certain by himself being the first person to be convinced of it
anger.author: Alexander Dumas

anger.quote: It is impossible to live without failing at something, unless you live so cautiously that you might as well not have lived at all – in which case, you fail by default. J.K
anger.author: Rowling

anger.quote: Ultimately, we all have to decide for ourselves what constitutes failure. But the world is quite eager to give you a set of criteria if you let it. J.K
anger.author: Rowling

anger.quote: It’s not easy, but if you accept your misfortune and handle it right, your perceived failure can become a catalyst for profound reinvention
anger.author: Conan O’Brien

anger.quote: We read the world wrong and say that it deceives us
anger.author: Rabindranath Tagore

anger.quote: Ninety-nine percent of the failures come from people who have the habit of making excuses
anger.author: George Washington Carver

anger.quote: It is your own bad strategies, not the unfair opponent, that are to blame for your failures. You are responsible for the good and bad in your life
anger.author: Robert Greene (The 33 Strategies of War)

anger.quote: Keep your head up in failure, and your head down in success
anger.author: Jerry Seinfeld

anger.quote: An action committed in anger, is an action doomed to failure
anger.author: Genghis Khan

anger.quote: What would you be glad you did – even if you failed?
anger.author: Brené Brown

anger.quote: If you learn from defeat, you haven’t really lost
anger.author: Zig Ziglar

anger.quote: People who have the ability to fail in public under their own names actually gain a lot of power
anger.author: Naval Ravikant

anger.quote: Failures are amplified by denying that they are failures
anger.author: Mark Manson

anger.quote: It is wise to keep in mind that neither success nor failure is ever final
anger.author: Roger Babson

anger.quote: If you experiment a lot you will fail often but at the same time your odds of success will also increase. Success and failure go hand in hand; they are not mutually exclusive. Learn to look at success and failure as gradations on a continuum, not as binary opposites
anger.author: The Ancient Sage

anger.quote: Just because you failed doesn’t mean you can’t succeed. We all fail. Mentally resilient people realize that its not failure that defines your identity but how you respond
anger.author: Shane Parrish

anger.quote: Blame is not for failure. It is for failing to help or ask for help
anger.author: Jorgen Vig Knudstorp (Lego)

anger.quote: Failure is nothing more than learning how to win
anger.author: Robin Sharma

anger.quote: I’ve come to realize that all my past failures and frustrations were actually laying the foundation for the understanding that have created the new level of living I now enjoy
anger.author: Tony Robbins

anger.quote: You’ve got to experience failure to understand that you can survive it
anger.author: Tina Fey

anger.quote: Always remember that failure is an event, not a person
anger.author: Zig Ziglar

anger.quote: Bad times have a scientific value. These are occasions a good learner would not miss
anger.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

anger.quote: With a hint of good judgment, to fear nothing, not failure or suffering or even death, indicates that you value life the most. You live to the extreme; you push limits; you spend your time building legacies. Those do not die
anger.author: Criss Jami

anger.quote: The trick is to take advantage of the particular details of the mess you’ve made, so that your next attempt will be informed by it and not just another blind stab in the dark
anger.author: Daniel Dennett

anger.quote: Part 1. Happiness needs sadness. Success needs failure. Benevolence needs evil. Love needs hatred. Victory needs defeat. Pleasure needs pain
anger.author: Philippos

anger.quote: Part 2. You must experience and accept the extremes because if the contrast is lost, you lose appreciation; and when you lose appreciation you lose the value of everything
anger.author: Philippos

anger.quote: There is no disgrace in honest failure; there is disgrace in fearing to fail. What is past is useful only as it suggests ways and means for progress
anger.author: Henry Ford (More on this quote here)

anger.quote: If at first you don’t succeed, try, try again. Then quit. There’s no point in being a damn fool about it. W. C
anger.author: Fields

anger.quote: To fail is to give up. But you are in the midst of a moving process. Nothing fails then. All goes on. Work is done. If good, you learn from it. If bad, you learn even more
anger.author: Ray Bradbury

anger.quote: Mistakes aren’t a necessary evil. They aren’t evil at all. They are an inevitable consequence of doing something new (and, as such, should be seen as valuable; without them, we’d have no originality)
anger.author: Ed Catmull (Co-founder of Pixar and president of Walt Disney Animation Studios)

anger.quote: The attempt to avoid failure makes failure more likely
anger.author: Ed Catmull

anger.quote: If you aren’t experiencing failure, it means you are failing
anger.author: Lance Allred

anger.quote: Initially, the films we put together, they’re a mess. It’s like everything else in life—the first time you do it, it’s a mess. Sometimes it’s labeled "a failure" but that’s not even the right word to use. It’s just like, you get the first one out, you learn from it, and the only failure is if you don’t learn from it, if you don’t progress
anger.author: Ed Catmull (Co-founder of Pixar and president of Walt Disney Animation Studios)

anger.quote: Most great people have attained their greatest success just one step beyond their greatest failure
anger.author: Napoleon Hill

anger.quote: A bad day for your ego is a great day for your soul
anger.author: Jillian Michaels

anger.quote: If you want to improve, you must be content to be thought foolish and stupid
anger.author: Epictetus

anger.quote: Dissolve your ego before it dissolves your self
anger.author: Maxime Lagacé

anger.quote: We come nearest to the great when we are great in humility
anger.author: Rabindranath Tagore

anger.quote: Let us be more simple and less vain
anger.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

anger.quote: The biggest challenge after success is shutting up about it
anger.author: Criss Jami

anger.quote: On the highest throne in the world, we still sit only on our own bottom
anger.author: Michel de Montaigne

anger.quote: Humility is nothing but truth, and pride is nothing but lying. St
anger.author: Vincent de Paul

anger.quote: Silence is the respite of the confident and strong
anger.author: Ryan Holiday

anger.quote: You’re not as good as you think. You don’t have it all figured out. Stay focused. Do better
anger.author: Ryan Holiday

anger.quote: Flattery is all right so long as you don’t inhale
anger.author: Adlai Stevenson

anger.quote: When ego is lost, limit is lost. You become infinite, kind, beautiful
anger.author: Harbhajan Singh Yogi

anger.quote: Destroy your illusions so you can see reality. Destroy your fears so you can take risks. Destroy your ego so you can see life
anger.author: Maxime Lagacé

anger.quote: Whenever I climb I am followed by a dog called ‘Ego’
anger.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

anger.quote: Don’t worry about looking good; worry about achieving your goal
anger.author: Ray Dalio

anger.quote: The ego seeks to divide and separate. Spirit seeks to unify and heal
anger.author: Pema Chödrön

anger.quote: Ego is false confidence, self-respect is true confidence
anger.author: Naval Ravikant

anger.quote: We must do our work for its own sake, not for fortune or attention or applause
anger.author: Steven Pressfield (The War of Art)

anger.quote: Impressing people is utterly different from being truly impressive
anger.author: John Boyd

anger.quote: My opponent is my teacher, my ego is my enemy
anger.author: Renzo Gracie

anger.quote: The bigger your heart, the more you love, the more you control your life. The bigger your ego, the more you’re scared, the more others control your life
anger.author: Maxime Lagacé

anger.quote: Your ego screams for people to acknowledge you. But you must do nothing. Take it. Eat it until you’re sick. Endure it. Quietly brush it off and work harder
anger.author: Ryan Holiday (Ego Is The Enemy)

anger.quote: Make your ego porous. Will is of little importance, complaining is nothing, fame is nothing. Openness, patience, receptivity, solitude is everything
anger.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

anger.quote: None are so empty as those who are full of themselves
anger.author: Benjamin Whichcote

anger.quote: The Ego’s job is to kill everything but itself
anger.author: Byron Katie

anger.quote: Where id was, there ego shall be
anger.author: Sigmund Freud

anger.quote: I have never seen a greater monster or miracle than myself
anger.author: Michel de Montaigne

anger.quote: Talking much about oneself can also be a means to conceal oneself
anger.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

anger.quote: All you need to know and observe in yourself is this: Whenever you feel superior or inferior to anyone, that’s the ego in you
anger.author: Eckhart Tolle

anger.quote: The only way to escape the corruptible effect of praise is to go on working
anger.author: Albert Einstein

anger.quote: Receive wealth or prosperity without arrogance; and be ready to let it go
anger.author: Marcus Aurelius

anger.quote: Whenever the world throws rose petals at you, which thrill and seduce the ego, beware. The cosmic banana peel is suddenly going to appear underfoot to make sure you don’t take it all too seriously, that you don’t fill up on junk food
anger.author: Anne Lamott

anger.quote: The ultimate aim of the ego is not to see something, but to be something
anger.author: Muhammad Iqbal

anger.quote: A man wrapped up in himself makes a very small bundle
anger.author: Benjamin Franklin

anger.quote: The gulf left by the absence of ego is quickly filled with knowledge
anger.author: Shane Parrish

anger.quote: Pride must die in you, or nothing of heaven can live in you
anger.author: Andrew Murray

anger.quote: It’s the sense of superiority and certainty that exceeds the bounds of confidence and talent
anger.author: Ryan Holiday

anger.quote: All ego really is, is our opinions, which we take to be solid, real, and the absolute truth about how things are
anger.author: Pema Chödrön

anger.quote: To me the ego is the habitual and compulsive thought processes that go through everybody’s mind continuously. External things like possessions or memories or failures or successes or achievements. Your personal history
anger.author: Eckhart Tolle

anger.quote: The ego is only an illusion, but a very influential one. Letting the ego-illusion become your identity can prevent you from knowing your true self
anger.author: Wayne Dyer

anger.quote: Your ego is your self-image created by thought. It’s your social mask requiring validation because it lives in fear of losing its sense of identity
anger.author: Thibaut

anger.quote: When the ego dies, the soul awakes
anger.author: Mahatma Gandhi

anger.quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong
anger.author: Mahatma Gandhi

anger.quote: Rule your mind or it will rule you
anger.author: Buddhist saying

anger.quote: It’s hard to be humble when you are as great as I am
anger.author: Muhammad Ali

anger.quote: I like the moment when I break a man’s ego
anger.author: Bobby Fischer (Chess player)

anger.quote: The foundation of the Buddha’s teachings lies in compassion, and the reason for practicing the teachings is to wipe out the persistence of ego, the number-one enemy of compassion
anger.author: Dalai Lama

anger.quote: If being an egomaniac means I believe in what I do and in my art or music, then in that respect you can call me that… I believe in what I do, and I’ll say it
anger.author: John Lennon

anger.quote: Part of me suspects that I’m a loser, and the other part of me thinks I’m God Almighty
anger.author: John Lennon

anger.quote: I don’t care what you think unless it is about me
anger.author: Kurt Cobain

anger.quote: Receive without pride, let go without attachment
anger.author: Marcus Aurelius

anger.quote: A man’s ego is the fountainhead of human progress
anger.author: Ayn Rand

anger.quote: Always keep your ego in check and not be afraid to listen. Listening is a great art form
anger.author: Clint Eastwood

anger.quote: It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit. Harry S
anger.author: Truman

anger.quote: Avoid having your ego so close to your position that when your position falls, your ego goes with it
anger.author: Colin Powell

anger.quote: The high destiny of the individual is to serve rather than to rule
anger.author: Albert Einstein

anger.quote: You never really learn much from hearing yourself speak
anger.author: George Clooney

anger.quote: The offspring of riches: Pride, vanity, ostentation, arrogance, tyranny
anger.author: Mark Twain

anger.quote: He that is proud eats up himself: pride is his own glass, his own trumpet, his own chronicle
anger.author: William Shakespeare

anger.quote: Forget about winning and losing, forget about pride and pain
anger.author: Bruce Lee

anger.quote: Kill your darlings, kill your darlings, even when it breaks your egocentric little scribbler’s heart, kill your darlings
anger.author: Stephen King

anger.quote: All a man has is pride. Sometimes you have it so much it is a sin. We have all done things for pride that we knew were impossible. We didn’t care. But a man must implement his pride with intelligence and care
anger.author: Ernest Hemingway

anger.quote: The walls of pride are high and wide, can’t see over to the other side
anger.author: Bob Dylan

anger.quote: We are all worms, but I do believe I am a glowworm
anger.author: Winston Churchill

anger.quote: Gratitude is the sign of noble souls
anger.author: Aesop

anger.quote: Ego takes everything personally
anger.author: Eckhart Tolle

anger.quote: Egotism sucks us down like the law of gravity
anger.author: Cyril Connolly

anger.quote: The ego is a veil between humans and God. In prayer all are equal
anger.author: Rumi

anger.quote: After success, keep working
anger.author: Maxime Lagacé

anger.quote: Pride goes before destruction
anger.author: Aesop

anger.quote: Men learn while they teach
anger.author: Seneca

anger.quote: Work for a cause, not for applause
anger.author: Unknown

anger.quote: There are two kinds of egotists: Those who admit it, and the rest of us. Laurence J
anger.author: Peter

anger.quote: Ego trip: a journey to nowhere
anger.author: Robert Half

anger.quote: Live life to express, not to impress
anger.author: Unknown

anger.quote: Starve your ego. Feed your soul
anger.author: Unknown

anger.quote: Bragging dims the soul
anger.author: Unknown

anger.quote: It’s better to be ignorant than wrong
anger.author: Shane Parrish

anger.quote: Be capable of negating your ego
anger.author: Robert Greene

anger.quote: The ego isn’t a real thing, it’s just the unexamined mind
anger.author: Thibaut

anger.quote: Ego is the enemy
anger.author: Ryan Holiday

anger.quote: Outcomes over ego
anger.author: Shane Parrish

anger.quote: We’d rather protect our ego than be happy
anger.author: Shane Parrish

anger.quote: Fragile egos make for fragile friendships
anger.author: @TheStoicEmperor

anger.quote: Truth above everything
anger.author: Naval Ravikant

anger.quote: Drop ego and listen. Empathize
anger.author: Naval Ravikant

anger.quote: Slow but steady wins the race
anger.author: Aesop

anger.quote: Soar with wit. Conquer with dignity. Handle with care
anger.author: Criss Jami

anger.quote: Make your interests gradually wider and more impersonal, until bit by bit the walls of the ego recede, and your life becomes increasingly merged in the universal life
anger.author: Bertrand Russell

anger.quote: Goals must never be from your ego, but problems that cry for a solution. Robert H
anger.author: Schuller

anger.quote: Greatness comes from humble beginnings; it comes from grunt work. It means you’re the least important person in the room — until you change that with results
anger.author: Ryan Holiday (Ego Is The Enemy)

anger.quote: Leave your ego at the door every morning, and just do some truly great work. Few things will make you feel better than a job brilliantly done
anger.author: Robin Sharma

anger.quote: We must go beyond the constant clamor of ego, beyond the tools of logic and reason, to the still, calm place within us: the realm of the soul
anger.author: Deepak Chopra

anger.quote: It’s not the great stars that win; it’s the great teams that win. It’s the teams that subjugate their ego to the team and put the team first
anger.author: Robert Kraft

anger.quote: The test we must set for ourselves is not to march alone but to march in such a way that others will wish to join us
anger.author: Hubert Humphrey

anger.quote: Celebrate, but not too loudly. Be proud, but not for too long
anger.author: Maxime Lagacé

anger.quote: When one is without ego, one becomes infinitely free of all personal judgements, and perceives life and the world with divine eyes and mind. Nothing is offensive to them and they remain in perfect serenity and peace always
anger.author: Mooji

anger.quote: The way to do really big things seems to be to start with deceptively small things
anger.author: Paul Graham

anger.quote: Maybe your parents will never be impressed, maybe your girlfriend won’t care. Maybe the investor won’t see the numbers, maybe the audience won’t clap. But we have to be able to push through. We can’t let that be what motivates us
anger.author: Ryan Holiday (Ego Is The Enemy)

anger.quote: Instead of treating events as wins or losses, ask "Did I learn something I can apply in the future?" If not, you must treat it as a loss
anger.author: Naval Ravikant

anger.quote: Learn to fail with pride – and do so fast and cleanly. Maximise trial and error – by mastering the error part
anger.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

anger.quote: Read books that challenge your beliefs and make you feel stupid. You don’t get better by protecting your ego. You get better by exposing it to truth and being vulnerable. This is how you remain fluid and grow
anger.author: @TheAncientSage

anger.quote: When you drop ego, you can have great fun because you are no longer taking anything personally. You are a detached observer which has a peculiar joy of its own. Ego is a source of great tension. Egoistic people are anxious, self-defensive and uptight. Drop the ego and chill out
anger.author: @TheAncientSage

anger.quote: Midlife is the time to let go of an overdominant ego and to contemplate the deeper significance of human existence
anger.author: Carl Gustav Jung

anger.quote: Fixed mindset is about ego, growth mindset is about presence
anger.author: Unknown

anger.quote: If you start believing in your greatness, it is the death of your creativity
anger.author: Marina Abramovic

anger.quote: Egotism is the anesthetic that dulls the pain of stupidity
anger.author: Frank Leahy

anger.quote: We cannot bear very much reality, we are biased to protect our egos against the onslaught of unwelcome truths
anger.author: Garrett Hardin

anger.quote: The ego is not master in its own house
anger.author: Sigmund Freud

anger.quote: Ignorance and power and pride are a deadly mixture, you know
anger.author: Robert Fulghum

anger.quote: Complaining is one of the ego’s favorite strategies for strengthening itself
anger.author: Eckhart Tolle

anger.quote: Humility is born of the spirit, humiliation of the ego
anger.author: Alan Cohen

anger.quote: If you never smile, you’re too serious. If you never help, you’re narcissist. If you never give, you never love
anger.author: Maxime Lagacé

anger.quote: Most of us are convinced that we are our egos, which is who we think we are. The ego is part of our incarnation. It dies with the body, which is why we are so afraid of death. Death scares the hell out of who you think you are, especially if you think you are this body
anger.author: Ram Dass

anger.quote: There’s no ego when you’re a ukulele player
anger.author: Jake Shimabukuro

anger.quote: Don’t accept your dog’s admiration as conclusive evidence that you are wonderful
anger.author: Ann Landers

anger.quote: The poor ego has a still harder time of it; it has to serve three harsh masters, and it has to do its best to reconcile the claims and demands of all three… The three tyrants are the external world, the superego, and the id
anger.author: Sigmund Freud

anger.quote: It has always seemed strange to me… the things we admire in men, kindness and generosity, openness, honesty, understanding and feeling, are the concomitants of failure in our system. And those traits we detest, sharpness, greed, acquisitiveness, meanness, egotism and self-interest, are the traits of success. And while men admire the quality of the first they love the produce of the second
anger.author: John Steinbeck

anger.quote: Ignorance, intolerance, egotism, self-assertion, opaque perception, dense and pitiful chuckle headedness – and an almost pathetic unconsciousness of it all, that is what I was at nineteen and twenty
anger.author: Mark Twain

anger.quote: One may understand the cosmos, but never the ego; the self is more distant than any star. Gilbert K
anger.author: Chesterton

anger.quote: The first principle is that you must not fool yourself – and you are the easiest person to fool
anger.author: Richard Feynman

anger.quote: Our ego is our silent partner – too often with a controlling interest
anger.author: Cullen Hightower

anger.quote: That’s how it seems to go: We’re never happy with what we have, we want what others have too. We want to have more than everyone else
anger.author: Ryan Holiday (Ego Is The Enemy)

anger.quote: Silence. The ability to deliberately keep yourself out of the conversation and subsist without its validation
anger.author: Ryan Holiday (Ego Is The Enemy)

anger.quote: The voice inside your head shapes what you see, think, and feel. It protects your ego, even if that means distorting reality
anger.author: Shane Parrish

anger.quote: Some people’s insecurity and ego fragility cannot tolerate the slightest offense
anger.author: Robert Greene

anger.quote: Once the ego inflates it will only come back to earth through some jarring failure
anger.author: Robert Greene

anger.quote: Man is not a rational animal he is a rationalizing animal. Robert A
anger.author: Heinlein

anger.quote: Leave the ego otherwise everyone will leave you
anger.author: Unknown

anger.quote: The loudest in the room is the weakest one in the room
anger.author: Frank Lucas (Denzel Washington in the movie American Gangster)

anger.quote: Fools try to make themselves bigger. The wise try to make themselves smaller
anger.author: Maxime Lagacé

anger.quote: The fools in life want things fast and easy — money, success, attention
anger.author: Robert Greene

anger.quote: The ego is always looking to find something. The Spirit can see what’s already there
anger.author: Marianne Williamson

anger.quote: Let your action be free of all traces of ego. When an action is free of ego it leaves no problems in its wake
anger.author: @TheAncientSage

anger.quote: For the ego to survive, it must make time – past and future – more important than the present moment
anger.author: Eckhart Tolle

anger.quote: The ego relies on the familiar. It is reluctant to experience the unknown, which is they very essence of life
anger.author: Deepak Chopra

anger.quote: What is rare is not raw talent, skill, or even confidence, but humility, diligence, and self-awareness
anger.author: Ryan Holiday (Ego Is The Enemy)

anger.quote: Body is purified by water. Ego by tears. Intellect is purified by knowledge. And soul is purified with love
anger.author: Ali ibn Abi Talib

anger.quote: I believe that the biggest problem that humanity faces is an ego sensitivity to finding out whether one is right or wrong and identifying what one’s strengths and weaknesses are
anger.author: Ray Dalio

anger.quote: Ego is about who’s right. Truth is about what’s right
anger.author: Mike Maples Jr

anger.quote: A willingness to be wrong in conversation can help you avoid being wrong in a costlier arena. Better to lose an argument than a fortune, or a war
anger.author: @TheStoicEmperor

anger.quote: A boaster and a liar are cousins
anger.author: German proverb

anger.quote: It is not titles that honor men, but men that honor titles
anger.author: Niccolò Machiavelli

anger.quote: Nations have their ego, just like individuals
anger.author: James Joyce

anger.quote: There is no one who would not rather appear to know than to be taught
anger.author: Marcus Fabius Quintilianus

anger.quote: Love is happy when it is able to give something. The ego is happy when it is able to take something
anger.author: Osho

anger.quote: The great corrupter of public men is the ego — corrupter because distracter
anger.author: Dean Acheson

anger.quote: Something good should be a source of pride, correct? ‘Yes’. And can one really take pride in a momentary pleasure? Please don’t say yes
anger.author: Marcus Aurelius

anger.quote: We have two ears and one mouth so that we can listen twice as much as we speak
anger.author: Epictetus

anger.quote: I think the hard thing here is seeing the truth. To see the truth, you have to get your ego out of the way because your ego doesn’t want to face the truth
anger.author: Naval Ravikant

anger.quote: The smaller you can make your ego, the less conditioned you can make your reactions, the less desires you can have about the outcome you want, the easier it to see the reality
anger.author: Naval Ravikant

anger.quote: Man stands in his own shadow and wonders why it is dark
anger.author: Zen proverb

anger.quote: Learning is easier if you are honest about your own ignorance. People want to seem "in the know." They try to signal that they are intelligent and informed. This is often counterproductive. Insecurity is the enemy of learning. A master knows how to be a beginner
anger.author: @TheStoicEmperor

anger.quote: It is a narrow passageway that leads to the garden of contentment. Big egos don’t fit
anger.author: @TheStoicEmperor

anger.quote: The key is to ego is distinguishing between when it’s serving you and when it’s getting in your way
anger.author: Shane Parrish

anger.quote: On the sentence "I’ve changed my mind": Four simple and underused words
anger.author: Naval Ravikant

anger.quote: Pride makes us do things well. But it is love that makes us do them to perfection. H
anger.author: Jackson Brown Jr

anger.quote: Whoever envies another confesses his superiority
anger.author: Samuel Johnson

anger.quote: Comparison is the thief of joy
anger.author: Theodore Roosevelt

anger.quote: Do not spoil what you have by desiring what you have not
anger.author: Ann Brashares

anger.quote: A wise man is content with his lot, whatever it may be, without wishing for what he has not
anger.author: Seneca

anger.quote: Do not overrate what you have received, nor envy others. He who envies others does not obtain peace of mind
anger.author: Buddha

anger.quote: The truest mark of being born with great qualities, is being born without envy
anger.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

anger.quote: Envy is pain at the good fortune of others
anger.author: Aristotle

anger.quote: Never hate jealous people. They are jealous because they think you are better than them
anger.author: Paulo Coelho

anger.quote: The spirit of envy can destroy; it can never build
anger.author: Margaret Thatcher

anger.quote: To live without comparison is to remove a tremendous burden
anger.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

anger.quote: Our envy always lasts longer than the happiness of those we envy
anger.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

anger.quote: No one can have all he wants, but a man can refrain from wanting what he has not, and cheerfully make the best of a bird in the hand
anger.author: Seneca

anger.quote: Jealousy is the tribute mediocrity pays to genius. Fulton J
anger.author: Sheen

anger.quote: The worst part of success is trying to find someone who is happy for you
anger.author: Bette Midler

anger.quote: The little "me" is jealous. The true self is content
anger.author: Maxime Lagacé

anger.quote: It is not greed that drives the world, but envy
anger.author: Warren Buffett

anger.quote: Nothing sharpens sight like envy
anger.author: Thomas Fuller

anger.quote: Envy is the central fact of American life
anger.author: Gore Vidal

anger.quote: Nothing brings on jealousy like laughter
anger.author: Françoise Sagan

anger.quote: Man will do many things to get himself loved; he will do all things to get himself envied
anger.author: Mark Twain

anger.quote: Surrounded by the flames of jealousy, the jealous one winds up, like the scorpion, turning the poisoned sting against himself
anger.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

anger.quote: The fastest way to lose friends and alienate people is to get better and improve yourself
anger.author: Life Math Money

anger.quote: Noble hearts are neither jealous nor afraid because jealousy spells doubt and fear spells pettiness
anger.author: Honoré de Balzac

anger.quote: People hate those who make them feel their own inferiority
anger.author: Lord Chesterfield

anger.quote: Jealousy is the only vice that gives no pleasure
anger.author: Patrick Henry

anger.quote: Our envy of others devours us most of all
anger.author: Alexander Solzhenitsyn

anger.quote: A competent and self-confident person is incapable of jealousy in anything. Jealousy is invariably a symptom of neurotic insecurity. Robert A
anger.author: Heinlein

anger.quote: Jealousy is information. It tells you what you desire, what you admire, what you despise in yourself. You could learn from the person you envy if you weren’t blinded by resentment. Learning feels better than loathing
anger.author: The Stoic Emperor

anger.quote: You don’t really see the person that you are envious of. You see a mirror that reflects what you find lacking in yourself. Paying attention to this can be very instructional. We often despise in others what we wish we could find in ourselves
anger.author: The Stoic Emperor

anger.quote: You can be the moon and still be jealous of the stars
anger.author: Gary Allan

anger.quote: As iron is eaten by rust, so are the envious consumed by envy
anger.author: Antisthenes

anger.quote: Jealousy is the very reverse of understanding, of sympathy, and of generous feeling. Never has jealousy added to character, never does it make the individual big and fine
anger.author: Emma Goldman

anger.quote: A little jealousy can be a good thing, for we may be reminded to appreciate what we have
anger.author: Shane Parrish

anger.quote: You’re subject to sorrow, fear, jealousy, anger and inconsistency. That’s the real reason you should admit that you are not wise
anger.author: Marcus Aurelius

anger.quote: Keep your attention focused entirely on what is truly your own concern, and be clear that what belongs to others is their business and none of yours
anger.author: Epictetus

anger.quote: Jealousy is all the fun you think they had
anger.author: Erica Jong

anger.quote: Jealousy is the most dreadfully involuntary of all sins
anger.author: Iris Murdoch

anger.quote: Jealousy is an ugly emotion, but it tells the truth. You mostly envy those who have what you desire
anger.author: Susan Cain

anger.quote: Envy is a declaration of inferiority
anger.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

anger.quote: For most of us, envy is the basis of our actions; remove envy and we feel we are lost. All our effort is towards success, and in that there is envy; behind that envy there is fear
anger.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

anger.quote: Envy is the art of counting the other fellow’s blessings instead of your own
anger.author: Harold Coffin

anger.quote: The wicked envy and hate; it is their way of admiring
anger.author: Victor Hugo

anger.quote: Oh, what a bitter thing it is to look into happiness through another man’s eyes
anger.author: William Shakespeare

anger.quote: Transform jealousy to admiration, and what you admire will become part of your life
anger.author: Yoko Ono

anger.quote: Anger, hatred and jealousy never solve problems, only affection, concern and respect can do that
anger.author: Dalai Lama

anger.quote: Jealousy is a miserable feeling. It means you aspire to something that you cannot have
anger.author: Sophia Loren

anger.quote: Jealousy in romance is like salt in food. A little can enhance the savor, but too much can spoil the pleasure and, under certain circumstances, can be life-threatening
anger.author: Maya Angelou

anger.quote: Jealousy, an eminently credulous and suspicious passion, allows fancy the greatest possible play. But it does not bestow wit, it banishes all sense
anger.author: Honoré de Balzac

anger.quote: When you wake up in the morning, tell yourself: The people I deal with today will be meddling, ungrateful, arrogant, dishonest, jealous and surely… None of them can hurt me. Don’t waste the rest of your time here worrying about other people… It will keep you from doing anything useful
anger.author: Why do you not rather act than complain? Marcus Aurelius

anger.quote: Envy is ignorance, imitation is suicide
anger.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

anger.quote: Everybody pities the weak; jealousy you have to earn
anger.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

anger.quote: Every time a friend succeeds, I die a little
anger.author: Gore Vidal

anger.quote: Envy blinds men and makes it impossible for them to think clearly
anger.author: Malcolm X

anger.quote: If you find happiness, people may be jealous. Be happy anyway
anger.author: Mother Teresa

anger.quote: You can’t be yourself within jealousy
anger.author: Toba Beta

anger.quote: Envy creates silent enemies
anger.author: Robert Greene

anger.quote: Never outshine the master
anger.author: Robert Greene

anger.quote: Our culture is based on envy
anger.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

anger.quote: Envy aims very high
anger.author: Ovid

anger.quote: It is better to be envied than pitied
anger.author: Herodotus

anger.quote: There is more self-love than love in jealousy
anger.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

anger.quote: It’s a completely useless emotion – jealousy. I don’t go there
anger.author: Joy Behar

anger.quote: Envy is an insult to oneself
anger.author: Yevgeny Yevtushenko

anger.quote: Envy motivates a lot of people
anger.author: Shia LaBeouf

anger.quote: Jealousy is an inner consciousness of one’s own inferiority. It is a mental cancer. B. C
anger.author: Forbes

anger.quote: O jealousy! thou magnifier of trifles
anger.author: Johann Christoph Friedrich von Schiller

anger.quote: Jealousy is the jaundice of the soul
anger.author: John Dryden

anger.quote: Nothing is as obnoxious as other people’s luck. F
anger.author: Scott Fitzgerald

anger.quote: Envy suggests inferiority
anger.author: Wayne Gerard Trotman

anger.quote: A sign of wealth: no envy, no fear
anger.author: Greg Isenberg

anger.quote: The few who do are the envy of the many who only watch
anger.author: Jim Rohn

anger.quote: Growth will convert your doubters better than verbal defensiveness. Outgrow your critics in every sense
anger.author: The Stoic Emperor

anger.quote: Envy comes from people’s ignorance of, or lack of belief in, their own gifts
anger.author: Jean Vanier

anger.quote: Everyone experiences bouts of jealousy; but the dignified person conceals it, while the vulgar one acts upon it
anger.author: Ibn Taymiyyah

anger.quote: One of the most powerful lessons in life is to recognize that no one can give you power, and many people don’t want you to have it. You have to find the courage to seize it, own it and hold on! Shannon L
anger.author: Alder

anger.quote: You are jealous because you are unaware that everything you need is inside you
anger.author: Peter Deunov

anger.quote: Negative emotions like loneliness, envy, and guilt have an important role to play in a happy life; they’re big, flashing signs that something needs to change
anger.author: Gretchen Rubin

anger.author: Petrarch

anger.author: Dalai Lama

anger.quote: The best way to avoid envy is to deserve the success you get
anger.author: Aristotle

anger.quote: Love may be blind but jealousy has 20-20 vision
anger.author: Anonymous

anger.quote: I envy people who drink – at least they know what to blame everything on
anger.author: Oscar Levant

anger.quote: If the grass is greener on the other side of the fence, you can bet the water bill is higher
anger.author: Debbie Macomber

anger.quote: Welcome to the wonderful world of jealousy, he thought. For the price of admission, you get a splitting headache, a nearly irresistible urge to commit murder, and an inferiority complex. Yippee. J.R
anger.author: Ward

anger.quote: My wife’s jealousy is getting ridiculous. The other day she looked at my calendar and wanted to know who May was
anger.author: Rodney Dangerfield

anger.quote: A jealous woman does better research than FBI
anger.author: Unknown

anger.quote: Jealousy implies dissatisfaction with what you are
anger.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

anger.quote: Jealousy is a keen observer, but looks for all the wrong signs. H. L
anger.author: Mencken

anger.quote: Pride, envy, avarice – these are the sparks have set on fire the hearts of all men
anger.author: Dante Alighieri

anger.quote: Envy was once considered to be one of the seven deadly sins before it became one of the most admired virtues under its new name, "social justice
anger.author: " Thomas Sowell

anger.quote: Facebook just sounds like a drag, in my day seeing pictures of peoples vacations was considered a punishment
anger.author: Betty White

anger.quote: We are always trying to become something else. We are always trying to become noble, to become a hero, an example, an ideal; and if we really go behind this urge to become, we will find that there is envy and that behind that envy there is fear, the fear of what one is
anger.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

anger.quote: Throughout life, from childhood, from school until we die, we are taught to compare ourselves with another; yet when I compare myself with another I am destroying myself
anger.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

anger.quote: As we are — the world is. That is, if we are greedy, envious, competitive, our society will be competitive, envious, greedy, which brings misery and war
anger.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

anger.quote: Jealousy – that jumble of secret worship and ostensible aversion
anger.author: Emil Cioran

anger.quote: Envy, if surrounded on all sides by the brightness of another’s prosperity, like the scorpion confined within a circle of fire, will sting itself to death
anger.author: Charles Caleb Colton

anger.quote: Envy lurks at the bottom of the human heart like a viper in its hole
anger.author: Honoré de Balzac

anger.quote: Jealousy can open the blood, it can make black roses
anger.author: Sylvia Plath

anger.quote: Jealousy is no more than feeling alone against smiling enemies
anger.author: Elizabeth Bowen

anger.quote: Now think of the things which goad man into destroying man: they are hope, envy, hatred, fear and contempt
anger.author: Marcus Aurelius

anger.quote: Yet he was jealous, though he did not show it, for jealousy dislikes the world to know it
anger.author: Lord Byron

anger.quote: Jealousy is always born with love, but does not die with it
anger.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

anger.quote: In jealousy there is more of self-love than of love to another
anger.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

anger.quote: I thought that jealousy was an idea. It isn’t. It’s a pain. But I didn’t feel as they do in a Broadway melodrama. I didn’t want to kill anybody. I just wanted to die
anger.author: Floyd Dell

anger.quote: Jealousy sees things always with magnifying glasses which make little things large, of dwarfs giants, of suspicions truths
anger.author: Miguel de Cervantes

anger.quote: The jealous are possessed by a mad devil and a dull spirit at the same time
anger.author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

anger.quote: More men die of jealousy than of cancer. Joseph P
anger.author: Kennedy

anger.quote: Jealousy is one of the wickedest of all the passions. But reprehensible though it is, jealousy is almost rather to be pitied than blamed – its first victims are those who harbor the feeling
anger.author: Arthur Lynch

anger.quote: The bitter often band together into anti-support groups, conspiring to ensure no one succeeds. Forward momentum is stamped out quickly by the ambient sense of disapproval. Individual growth threatens the communal cover story
anger.author: "If you can progress, what does that say about me?" The Stoic Emperor

anger.quote: Jealousy or a zero-sum view of success, someone else getting all the attention
anger.author: Jerry Neumann

anger.quote: The lovesick, the betrayed, and the jealous all smell alike
anger.author: Colette

anger.quote: The envious die not once, but as oft as the envied win applause
anger.author: Baltasar Gracian

anger.quote: Don’t be envious. Be inspired
anger.author: Thibaut

anger.quote: Of the seven deadly sins, only envy is no fun at all
anger.author: Joseph Epstein

anger.quote: Maybe jealousy and envy would fade if we knew the full story behind success. Maybe we would be less likely to put people on a pedestal
anger.author: James Clear

anger.quote: It’s such a poisonous emotion because, at the end of the day, you’re no better off, you’re unhappier, and the person you’re jealous of is still successful or good-looking or whatever they are
anger.author: Naval Ravikant

anger.quote: Do you want to be that person with all of their reactions, their desires, their family, their happiness level, their outlook on life, and their self image? If you’re not willing to do a whole sale, 24/7, 100% swap with who that person is, then there’s no point in being jealous
anger.author: Naval Ravikant

anger.quote: Envy and jealousy are the private parts of the human soul. Perhaps the comparison can be extended
anger.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

anger.quote: Jealousy is beautiful only on a young and ardent face. After the first wrinkles, trust must return
anger.author: Alfred Capus

anger.quote: The poor man is ruined as soon as he begins to ape the rich
anger.author: Publius Syrus (The Moral Sayings of Publius Syrus, Amazon book)

anger.quote: Jealousy is both reasonable and belongs to reasonable men, while envy is base and belongs to the base, for the one makes himself get good things by jealousy, while the other does not allow his neighbor to have them through envy
anger.author: Aristotle

anger.quote: Envy shoots at others and wounds itself
anger.author: English proverb

anger.quote: When you criticize someone, see if you are doing it out of envy. Your criticism reveals more about yourself than you realize
anger.author: Haemin Sunim

anger.quote: When you show yourself to the world and display your talents, you naturally stir all kinds of resentment, envy, and other manifestations of insecurity… you cannot spend your life worrying about the petty feelings of others
anger.author: Robert Greene

anger.quote: Appearing better than others is always dangerous, but most dangerous of all is to appear to have no faults or weaknesses. Envy creates silent enemies. It is smart to occasionally display defects, and admit to harmless vices, in order to deflect envy and appear more approachable
anger.author: Robert Greene

anger.quote: Envy among other ingredients has a mixture of the love of justice in it. We are more angry at undeserved than at deserved good-fortune
anger.author: William Hazlitt

anger.quote: We experience envy when the quality we feel inferior about threatens our self-concept
anger.author: Shane Parrish

anger.quote: Envy of others is always a reflection of something we feel about ourselves
anger.author: Shane Parrish

anger.quote: It is not love that is blind, but jealousy
anger.author: Lawrence Durrell

anger.quote: Blessed is he who has learned to admire but not envy, to follow but not imitate, to praise but not flatter, and to lead but not manipulate
anger.author: William Arthur Ward

anger.quote: If you hate a person, then you’re defeated by them
anger.author: Confucius

anger.quote: Not being outraged by anything is a superpower
anger.author: James Pierce

anger.quote: The smarter you get, the more you realize anger is not worth it
anger.author: Maxime Lagacé

anger.quote: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.
anger.author: Unknown

anger.quote: Anger makes us feel so isolated
anger.author: Fred Rogers

anger.quote: An action committed in anger is an action doomed to failure
anger.author: Genghis Khan

anger.quote: One’s anger is one’s greatest enemy and one’s calmness is one’s protection
anger.author: Sathya Sai Baba

anger.quote: Another person will not hurt you without your cooperation. You are hurt the moment you believe yourself to be
anger.author: Epictetus

anger.quote: Shouting something didn’t make it any more possible
anger.author: Susan Sontag

anger.quote: Tears of despair can be fuel. Thunders of anger can be light
anger.author: Maxime Lagacé

anger.quote: I would not look upon anger as something foreign to me that I have to fight… I have to deal with my anger with care, with love, with tenderness, with nonviolence
anger.author: Thich Nhat Hanh (Being Peace, Amazon book)

anger.quote: If you’re offended easily, you’re a bad resource allocator. It’s a waste of energy and attention, which is a greater sin than wasting time
anger.author: Tim Ferriss

anger.quote: It always makes me proud to love the world somehow – hate’s so easy compared
anger.author: Jack Kerouac (Big Sur)

anger.quote: It doesn’t hurt me unless I interpret it’s happening as harmful to me. I can choose not to
anger.author: Marcus Aurelius

anger.quote: I will permit no man to narrow and degrade my soul by making me hate him. Booker T
anger.author: Washington

anger.quote: No one heals himself by wounding another
anger.author: Ambrose

anger.quote: Hatred is public and shameless demonstration of inferiority complex
anger.author: Paulo Coelho

anger.quote: Everything that irritates us about others can lead us to an understanding of ourselves
anger.author: Carl Jung

anger.quote: The instant we feel anger we have already ceased striving for the truth, and have begun striving for ourselves
anger.author: Buddhist proverb

anger.quote: Judge, and feel separate and lonely. Anger, and lose peace of mind. Cling, and live in anxiety. Fantasize, and miss the present. Desire, and suffer until you have it
anger.author: Naval Ravikant

anger.quote: Friendly reminder. If you ever lose your temper it is your fault. Always. Your emotional responses are never the responsibility of any other human being
anger.author: Thibaut

anger.quote: Everyone asks how to deal with anger when it arises. No one asks how to prevent anger from arising
anger.author: James Pierce

anger.quote: So other people hurt me? That’s their problem. Their character and actions are not mine
anger.author: Marcus Aurelius

anger.quote: A man is about as big as the things that make him angry
anger.author: Winston Churchill

anger.quote: You will not be punished for your anger, you will be punished by your anger
anger.author: Buddha

anger.quote: We will cease to be angry once we cease to be so hopeful
anger.author: Alain de Botton

anger.quote: An angry man opens his mouth and shuts his eyes
anger.author: Cato The Elder

anger.quote: Delay gratification. Don’t give your ego the satisfaction of a scream
anger.author: Maxime Lagacé

anger.quote: The best way to avenge yourself is to not be like that
anger.author: Marcus Aurelius

anger.quote: When you think you’ve been injured, apply this rule: If the community isn’t injured by it, neither am I. And if it is, anger is not the answer. Show the offender where he went wrong
anger.author: Marcus Aurelius

anger.quote: Keep this thought handy when you feel a fit of rage coming on — it isn’t manly to be enraged. Rather, gentleness and civility are more human, and therefore manlier. A real man doesn’t give way to anger and discontent, and such a person has strength, courage, and endurance — unlike the angry and complaining. The nearer a man comes to a calm mind, the closer he is to strength
anger.author: Marcus Aurelius

anger.quote: The best thing you can do when you are angry is nothing
anger.author: @orangebook_

anger.quote: We can’t control what people say, but we do have a say in how we react. Refusing to give others power over our feelings is a mark of emotional intelligence
anger.author: Adam Grant

anger.quote: Only when we know our own darkness well can we be present with the darkness of others
anger.author: Pema Chödron

anger.quote: If we could learn to like ourselves, even a little, maybe our cruelties and angers might melt away
anger.author: John Steinbeck

anger.quote: A person does not react to the insult. He reacts to what the insult makes him feel about himself
anger.author: Kapil Gupta

anger.quote: A verbal threat is the most authentic certificate of impotence
anger.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb (The Bed of Procrustes)

anger.quote: Hatred is like a two edged sword. When you cut the other person you cut yourself
anger.author: Haruki Murakami (The Wind-Up Bird Chronicle)

anger.quote: A wise man looks for everything inside of himself; a madman seeks for everything in others
anger.author: Leo Tolstoy

anger.quote: When you want to become free, your righteousness and anger are much less interesting than they used to be
anger.author: Ram Dass

anger.quote: Just because you’re offended doesn’t mean you’re right. Being offended is a choice and should be chosen wisely
anger.author: Mark Manson

anger.quote: An eye for an eye will only make the whole world blind
anger.author: Mahatma Gandhi

anger.quote: The greatest remedy for anger is delay
anger.author: Seneca

anger.quote: Most quarrels are inevitable at the time; incredible afterwards. E. M
anger.author: Forster

anger.quote: I get angry about things, then go on and work
anger.author: Toni Morrison

anger.quote: Anger… it’s a paralyzing emotion… you can’t get anything done. People sort of think it’s an interesting, passionate, and igniting feeling – I don’t think it’s any of that – it’s helpless … it’s absence of control – and I need all of my skills, all of the control, all of my powers … and anger doesn’t provide any of that – I have no use for it whatsoever
anger.author: Toni Morrison

anger.quote: Hate, it has caused a lot of problems in the world, but has not solved one yet
anger.author: Maya Angelou

anger.quote: If your hate could be turned into electricity, it would light up the whole world
anger.author: Nikola Tesla

anger.quote: Hating clouds the mind. It gets in the way of strategy. Leaders cannot afford to hate
anger.author: Nelson Mandela

anger.quote: Anger may seem to be a source of energy, but it’s blind. It causes us to lose our restraint. It may stir courage, but that too is blind
anger.author: 14th Dalai Lama

anger.quote: Anger dwells only in the bosom of fools
anger.author: Albert Einstein

anger.quote: When reason ends, then anger begins. Therefore, anger is a sign of weakness
anger.author: 14th Dalai Lama

anger.quote: Anger is a weed; hate is the tree
anger.author: Augustine of Hippo

anger.quote: Anybody can become angry – that is easy, but to be angry with the right person and to the right degree and at the right time and for the right purpose, and in the right way – that is not within everybody’s power and is not easy
anger.author: Aristotle

anger.quote: I imagine one of the reasons people cling to their hates so stubbornly is because they sense, once hate is gone, they will be forced to deal with pain
anger.author: James Baldwin

anger.quote: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness
anger.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

anger.quote: Anger is an acid that can do more harm to the vessel in which it is stored than to anything on which it is poured
anger.author: Mark Twain

anger.quote: Doing an injury puts you below your enemy; revenging one makes you but even with him; forgiving, it sets you above him
anger.author: Benjamin Franklin

anger.quote: Anger is only one letter short of danger
anger.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

anger.quote: There is no passion so much transports the sincerity of judgement as doth anger
anger.author: Michel de Montaigne

anger.quote: Never hate your enemies. It affects your judgment
anger.author: Mario Puzo (The Godfather)

anger.quote: Never waste a minute thinking about people you don’t like. Dwight D
anger.author: Eisenhower

anger.quote: Anger reduces reason
anger.author: Shane Parrish

anger.quote: Taking offense is optional
anger.author: Jack Butcher

anger.quote: If you’re mad it is your fault
anger.author: Jonathan Wilson

anger.quote: Anger is really disappointed hope
anger.author: Erica Jong

anger.quote: All ferocity is born from weakness
anger.author: Seneca

anger.quote: The best answer for anger is silence
anger.author: Paulo Coelho

anger.quote: Anger is fleeting; remorse is eternal
anger.author: Karn the Silver Golem

anger.quote: You are the first victim of your anger. D
anger.author: Muthukrishnan

anger.quote: Don’t respond to provocation with imitation
anger.author: @TheStoicEmperor

anger.quote: When anger rises, think of the consequences
anger.author: Confucius

anger.quote: Fire in the heart sends smoke into the head
anger.author: German proverb

anger.quote: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience
anger.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

anger.quote: Hating someone does more damage to yourself than them
anger.author: Sahil Lavingia

anger.quote: He who angers you conquers you
anger.author: Elizabeth Kenny

anger.quote: Promote what you love instead of bashing what you hate
anger.author: Unknown

anger.quote: You either give up and quit, or you get angry and fight
anger.author: Willow Cross

anger.quote: Take a step back and smile. Don’t take a step forward and scream
anger.author: Maxime Lagacé

anger.quote: Haters are confused admirers who want to be like you
anger.author: Paulo Coelho

anger.quote: Any person capable of angering you becomes your master. They can anger you only when you permit yourself to be disturbed by them
anger.author: Epictetus

anger.quote: Conquer the angry one by not getting angry; conquer the wicked by goodness; conquer the stingy by generosity, and the liar by speaking the truth
anger.author: The Dhammapada

anger.quote: Anger comes so fast we don’t even notice it. Cultivating detachment, presence and silence every day will help you react less
anger.author: Maxime Lagacé

anger.quote: Understand at last that you have something in you more powerful and divine than what causes the bodily passions and pulls you like a mere puppet
anger.author: Marcus Aurelius

anger.quote: As you move forward along the path of reason, people will stand in your way. They will never be able to keep you from doing what’s sound, so don’t let them knock out your goodwill for them. Keep a steady watch on both fronts, not only for well-based judgments and actions, but also for gentleness with those who would obstruct our path or create other difficulties. For getting angry is also a weakness, just as much as abandoning the task or surrendering under panic. For doing either is an equal desertion — the one by shrinking back and the other by estrangement from family and friend
anger.author: Marcus Aurelius

anger.quote: When pain, misery, or anger happen, it is time to look within you, not around you
anger.author: Sadhguru

anger.quote: Anger is not attractive. Calmness backed by real strength is
anger.author: Unknown

anger.quote: All of us have some darkness inside of us – aggression, anger, hatred – the idea isn’t to get rid of it. The idea is to realize it exists for a reason, and once you learn how to leverage it without it corroding you, you’ll have the ability to push through the hardest of times
anger.author: Tom Bilyeu

anger.quote: How satisfying it is to dismiss and block out any upsetting or foreign impression, and immediately to have peace in all things
anger.author: Marcus Aurelius

anger.quote: When you fill your life with love, you’ll find that anger, guilt, resentment, and any negative feelings will leave you
anger.author: Rhonda Byrne

anger.quote: We all have negative urges, but we don’t have to act out those urges
anger.author: Fred Rogers

anger.quote: Be aware of whom the anger is hurting. Usually it’s yourself first and foremost. I now mostly feel sorry for angry people
anger.author: Naval Ravikant

anger.quote: Look at the people you don’t love and see them as an exercise for you to open your heart
anger.author: Ram Dass

anger.quote: Be angry, it’s okay. To be angry, that is very human. And to learn how to smile at your anger and make peace with your anger is very nice
anger.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

anger.quote: When you are angry, be aware of your anger. As you become aware of it, you are no longer lost in anger. You get to see it from the outside
anger.author: Haemin Sunim

anger.quote: Holding grudges is stupid, unproductive and poisonous. Only fools hold on. The wise let go
anger.author: Maxime Lagacé

anger.quote: The more anger towards the past you carry in your heart, the less capable you are of loving in the present
anger.author: Barbara De Angelis

anger.quote: The biggest mistake we make with negative emotions is trying not to feel them. Awareness deepens positive emotions and allows negative ones to dissipate. Trying to avoid your feelings causes suffering
anger.author: Shane Parrish

anger.quote: Anger and frustration are rarely caused by other people’s actions. They’re caused by how you interpret their actions. To change your reactions, question your explanations. You know what they did, but not why. New interpretations pave the way to new emotions
anger.author: Adam Grant

anger.quote: One of the most banal yet personally profound insights a person can have is the realization that one does not have to let their emotions determine their behavior. Ever. You’re actually allowed to listen to the signals and decide: "nawwww I’ll pass
anger.author: " Scott Barry Kaufman

anger.quote: You can dislike someone and still learn from them
anger.author: Angela Jiang

anger.quote: Pause and ask yourself: "Does this really need a response?" Little annoyances come and go. The irritation fades quickly if it is not indulged
anger.author: @TheStoicEmperor

anger.quote: Try to avoid making important decisions when you’re angry. Acknowledge the emotion. Recognize that it clouds your judgement. Remember that angry people tend to sacrifice the long-term good in response to short-term provocation
anger.author: @TheStoicEmperor

anger.quote: Why can’t we control our anger? Because we love perfection. Make a little room for imperfection in our lives
anger.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

anger.quote: Promise yourself that you will assume you are the root of your problems next time you get upset
anger.author: Mark Manson

anger.quote: Never go to bed mad. Stay up and fight
anger.author: Phyllis Diller

anger.quote: Angry is just sad’s bodyguard
anger.author: Liz Palmer

anger.quote: Speak when you are angry and you will make the best speech you will ever regret
anger.author: Ambrose Bierce

anger.quote: Unsubscribe from your drama
anger.author: Thibaut (@kpaxs)

anger.quote: You shouldn’t give circumstances the power to rouse anger, for they don’t care at all
anger.author: Marcus Aurelius

anger.quote: People generally quarrel because they cannot argue. G. K
anger.author: Chesterton

anger.quote: It’s funny how people think you hate them when you literally do not think of them at all
anger.author: Paulo Coelho

anger.quote: When angry, count four. When very angry, swear
anger.author: Mark Twain

anger.quote: Anger: when reality and expectations don’t fit
anger.author: Maxime Lagacé

anger.quote: Bitterness: anger that forgot where it came from
anger.author: Alain de Botton

anger.quote: Those who want to be outraged are never without a reason
anger.author: James Pierce

anger.quote: Anger is its own punishment. An angry person trying to push your head below water is drowning at the same time
anger.author: Naval Ravikant

anger.quote: The ignorant mind, with its infinite afflictions, passions, and evils, is rooted in the three poisons: greed, anger, and delusion
anger.author: Bodhidharma

anger.quote: Reason gives each side time to plead; moreover, she herself demands adjournment, that she may have sufficient scope for the discovery of the truth; whereas anger is in a hurry: reason wishes to give a just decision; anger wishes its decision to be thought just. … The sword of justice is ill-placed in the hands of an angry man
anger.author: Seneca

anger.quote: Anger is not impressive or tough — it’s a mistake. It’s weakness. Depending on what you’re doing, it might even be a trap that someone laid for you
anger.author: Ryan Holiday

anger.quote: If you’re angry, you’re part of the problem, not the solution
anger.author: Ryan Holiday

anger.quote: How much more harmful are the consequences of anger and grief than the circumstances that aroused them in us
anger.author: Marcus Aurelius

anger.quote: You remember the insults you received far more than those you gave
anger.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

anger.quote: Anger is privilege for the strong, duty for the righteous, and self-harm for the weak
anger.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

anger.quote: If you are easily offended you are also easily persuaded
anger.author: @AmuseChimp

anger.quote: How easily someone is offended is in direct proportion to how stupid they are
anger.author: Ed Latimore

anger.quote: The further a society drifts from the truth the more it will hate those who speak it
anger.author: George Orwell

anger.quote: To indulge in outrage is to renounce wisdom
anger.author: James Pierce

anger.quote: To investigate the fact of your own anger you must pass no judgement on it
anger.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

anger.quote: If you want to determine the nature of anything, entrust it to time: when the sea is stormy, you can see nothing clearly
anger.author: Seneca

anger.quote: Some things torment us more than they ought; some torment us before they ought; and others torment us when they ought not torment us at all
anger.author: Seneca

anger.quote: The wisest fight only for things that truly matter. They know time and energy are limited. For fools, all things matter
anger.author: Maxime Lagacé

anger.quote: The more upset a person is with other people, and with circumstances, and the more satisfied he is with himself, the further he is from wisdom
anger.author: Leo Tolstoy

anger.quote: Never argue with people in private (you will not convince them); argue in public to convince others
anger.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

anger.quote: How much more grievous are the consequences of anger than the causes of it
anger.author: Marcus Aurelius

anger.quote: Anger and aggression sometimes seem to be protective because they bring energy to bear on a particular situation, but that energy is blind. It takes a calm mind to be able to consider things from different angles and points of view
anger.author: 14th Dalai Lama

anger.quote: The intoxication of anger, like that of the grape, shows us to others, but hides us from ourselves
anger.author: John Dryden

anger.quote: It is wise to direct your anger towards problems – not people; to focus your energies on answers – not excuses
anger.author: William Arthur Ward

anger.quote: Only the stupid respond to anger with anger. The smart respond with indifference
anger.author: Unknown

anger.quote: The transition from anger to calmness is called education
anger.author: Unknown

anger.quote: First to anger loses the battle. Last to anger wins the war
anger.author: Alex Sauer

anger.quote: He that is kind is free, though he is a slave; he that is evil is a slave, though he be a king
anger.author: Augustine of Hippo

anger.quote: Hatred is, indeed, never appeased by hatred in this world. It is appeased only by loving-kindness. This is an ancient law
anger.author: The Dhammapada

anger.quote: The remarkable thing is that we really love our neighbor as ourselves: we do unto others as we do unto ourselves. We hate others when we hate ourselves. We are tolerant toward others when we tolerate ourselves. We forgive others when we forgive ourselves. We are prone to sacrifice others when we are ready to sacrifice ourselves
anger.author: Eric Hoffer
